title: Stop Searching and Start Living!
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Rafael Town Center an apartment community that brings modern comfort right to the heart of Marin County.
Our apartments in San Rafael come in studio, one-, and two-bedroom floor plans that feature interior and community amenities expertly designed with modern touches around every corner.
Premium material finishes such as granite countertops and espresso wood flooring complement large dual-pane windows and gourmet kitchens to create a contemporary feel that suits the discerning taste.
Select apartment homes feature a washer/dryer, breakfast bar, and private patio/balcony and more.
Contact us or stop by our leasing office to schedule a tour!
Cats - Max 2 allowedComments: Only Cats Allowed.
Pet Deposit is $500.00 per cat and Pet Rent is $50.00 per cat.
Restrictions:Unless used as an assistance animal, dogs are NOT allowed.
Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range/Oven
